data.name: Invirium
data.detailed_description:
MORE GAMES

Check this games from Art Games Studio:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1231840/Climber_Sky_is_the_Limit/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1155870/WW2_Bunker_Simulator
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1199910/SWAN_Chernobyl_Unexplored/


About the Game




Invirium is an action shooter game with randomly generated levels and elements from the roguelike genre. You are the cell that needs to eliminate dangerous pathogens in the human body. During the gameplay, you'll find interesting items that will help you upgrade/add new abilities to fight against tons of microorganisms.

MICROORGANISM
You will find a lot of inner body enemies like bacterias, viruses, or fungus. Be patient and vigilant against them - each has unique qualities which might annihilate you.


ORGANS
You will lurk many organs like the intestines, kidneys, or liver to eliminate pathogens. Explore and find life references to the human body.


MEDICAL NEWS
Apart from cool gameplay, you can find useful information about medical news in this game world "Virofarium" and more!

data.short_description: Try to challenge the uncontrollable microorganisms world. You are only one - small cell against many pathogens to exterminate. Save the human body and reach the inner body nirvana.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/8 64 Bit
  • Processor: i5 4690k 3.5GHz / AMD FX 8320 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalant
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/8 64 Bit
  • Processor: i5 8600k 3.6GHz / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
